tool_description: Places validated orders to specified trading venues and returns order confirmations with unique identifiers.

connection_id.description: Active connection identifier for the venue

quantity.description: Order quantity in shares or units

order_type.description: Order type: market, limit, stop, stop_limit

time_in_force.description: Time in force: day, gtc, ioc, fok

error_messages: Connection invalid: Connection ID is not active or has expired. Reconnect to venue.
Order rejected: Venue rejected order due to risk controls or market conditions.
Insufficient funds: Account does not have sufficient buying power for this order.
Market closed: Venue is not accepting orders during current market hours.
Duplicate client order ID: Client order ID already exists. Use unique identifier.
usage: Provide validated order parameters along with active connection_id. Price is required for limit and stop_limit orders.

venue_order_id.description: Unique order identifier assigned by the trading venue

client_order_id.description: Client order identifier used for tracking

order_status.description: Initial order status: new, pending, accepted, or rejected

timestamp.description: Order placement timestamp in ISO 8601 format
